# XPC_BOOL_TRUE

**Global Variable**

A constant that represents a Boolean value of true.

## Declaration

```swift
var XPC_BOOL_TRUE: xpc_object_t { get }
```

## Discussion

You may compare a Boolean object against this constant to determine its value.

## Boolean objects

- **xpc_bool_create(_:)**: Creates an XPC Boolean object.
- **xpc_bool_get_value(_:)**: Returns the underlying Boolean value from the object.
- **XPC_BOOL_FALSE**: A constant that represents a Boolean value of false.

items.description: Returns the underlying Boolean value from the object.
